scripts.analyze: vite build --mode production && npm run size-report
scripts.size-report: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const getSize=(p)=>{const s=fs.statSync(p); return s.isFile()?s.size:fs.readdirSync(p).reduce((a,f)=>a+getSize(path.join(p,f)),0)}; const mb=(b)=>(b/1024/1024).toFixed(2)+'MB'; console.log('\nðŸ“¦ Build Size Report:\n'); const dist=getSize('dist'); console.log('Total: '+mb(dist)); if(fs.existsSync('dist/assets')){console.log('Assets: '+mb(getSize('dist/assets')))}"
